item.description:
Ebisu is a wonderful Japanese restaurant serving authentic and delicious yakitori, noodles, and shabu shabu (sorry, no sushi). This is one of my favorite restaurants in Providence!

They have been so kind as to offer drinks and apps deal ONLY for our Newcomers to Providence group!

$6 Saketinis (original sake martinis)
- Hello Kitty
- Dancing Dragon
- Tropical Cloud
- and much more

$3 Appetizers
- shumai
- yakitori
- miso salmon
- and much more

$1.50/ea Oysters

You may order Japanese and domestic beers, sake, wines, and other menu items at regular price.

The specials run from 6pm to 10pm.

For more information about Ebisu or to look at their menu, please visit http://ebisuri.com...
item.name: Saketini Night @ Ebisu
